thread.title: Kylie Jenner Poses for Her Wax Figure, Slams Critics Saying She Was Trying to Darken Her Skin Tone
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner Poses for Her Wax Figure, Slams Critics Saying She Was Trying to Darken Her Skin Tone

author: Rachel McRady
title: Kylie Jenner Poses for Her Wax Figure, Slams Critics Saying She Was Trying to Darken Her Skin Tone
text: Kylie Jenner Poses for Her Wax Figure, Slams Critics Saying She Was Trying to Darken Her Skin Tone by Rachel McRady 2:12   Instagram Those iconic lips will be preserved in wax forever! Kylie Jenner took her fans behind the scenes of her future wax figure on Wednesday, Snapchatting the process of getting measured for the display. A video posted by Kylie Jenner Snapchats (@kylizzlesnapchats) on Feb 1, 2017 at 7:35pm PST To get accurate measurements in, the 19-year-old reality star rocked a tiny grey sports bra and charcoal grey bicycle shorts with matching stiletto heels. She posed looking over her shoulder. She also shared the note from the famous wax museum Madame Tussaud’s, writing, “Thanks Madame Tussaud’s can’t wait to live in Hollywood forever lol.” A video posted by Kylie Jenner Snapchats (@kylizzlesnapchats) on Feb 1, 2017 at 7:40pm PST But the cosmetics queen wasn’t having some of the criticism she received from the skin tone palette the sculptors were using. A video posted by Kylie Jenner Snapchats (@kylizzlesnapchats) on Feb 1, 2017 at 7:41pm PST "I'm not trying to make my wax figure darker than I am, you f**king idiots,” Kylie declared in one Snapchat while sporting bear ears and an altered voice. “They were mixing all those colors on a palette, not me. Stop reaching. I don't even have say in this, so let's leave it to the professionals, people." Kylie recently returned from her exotic family vacation to Costa Rica . To see some of her racy bikini looks, watch the clip below! RELATED SLIDESHOW
